Name: Modding API
Author: Damocles
Description: A modding API that assists the creation of mods for Blasphemous 2

Name: Cheat Console
Author: Damocles
Description: Adds a console with various debug commands

Name: Debug Mod
Author: Damocles
Description: Provides various debug utilities such as hitbox viewer and free cam

Name: Save and Quit
Author: Damocles
Description: Allows the player to save and quit from anywhere
